closeOnAction.description: Whether to return to the position automatically when the operation button is clicked
closeOnAction.description_zh: 点击操作按钮时是否自动返回位置

closeOnTouchOutside.description: Whether to return to the position automatically when other areas is clicked
closeOnTouchOutside.description_zh: 点击其他区域时是否自动返回位置

leftActions.description: List of operation buttons on the left

rightActions.description: List of operation buttons on the right

stopPropagation.description: Stop the propagation of some events.

events.name: onAction
events.description: Triggered when operation button is clicked

events.name: onActionsReveal
events.description: Triggered when the operation button appears completely
events.description_zh: 操作按钮完全出现时触发

methods.name: close
methods.description: Let the slide bar return to the position

methods.name: show
methods.description: Slide out the operation button, the side parameter defaults to right
methods.description_zh: 滑出操作按钮，侧参数默认为右
